TracerSubstance.FullName: Horseradish peroxidase, conjugated to wheat germ agglutinin

Reference.Quotation: "In one animal, case 94-81, a single injection of WGA-HRP was placed in the lower bank of the caudal branch of the lunate sulcus (see Fig. 1 legend for definition of the caudal branch). In flattened cortex, it was apparent that this injection was located medially in the caudal part of DM (Fig. 4)." pp. 490-491
